name: Satay Chicken Pizza
author: Sarah Bloom
summary: This recipe was developed in response to hunger, a creative impulse, and a lack of other food in the house. It's great. Really.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, chopped
directions: Heat oil in a skillet over high heat
Saute chicken pieces in hot oil for 6 to 7 minutes
Do not overcook! Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
To Assemble Pizza: Spoon 1/4 of peanut sauce onto each pita
Sprinkle 1/4 of the browned chicken and 1/4 of the scallions on top of each
Place on a lightly greased cookie sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbly
Let stand for 1 to 2 minutes outside of oven before you cut with a pizza cutter
